code: import{SET_CONTACT}from"../operationsTaskConstant";import{ADD_CONTACT,DELETE_CONTACT,SET_LOCAL_STORAGE}from"../mainConstant/index";export var addContact=function addContact(objContact){return{type:ADD_CONTACT,payload:objContact};};export var deleteContact=function deleteContact(id){return{type:DELETE_CONTACT,payload:id};};export var setContactLocalStorage=function setContactLocalStorage(array){return{type:SET_LOCAL_STORAGE,payload:array};};export var setContact=function setContact(contacts){return{type:SET_CONTACT,payload:contacts};};
